lexUnit.name: prowess.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: skill or expertise in a particular activity or field.

sentence.text: One of these showed itself in his prowess as a teenage hypnotist .
He too is remembered for his prowess as a disabled golfer having lost his left arm , and part of his right arm below the elbow -- probably in the First World War .
